1mo ‚Ä¢ Edited ‚Ä¢ 
 1 month ago ‚Ä¢ Edited ‚Ä¢ Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
As part of the Tomoh Program to support high-growth companies, we were proud to oversee the implementation of two impactful programs in collaboration with
Saudi Arabia:

üîπ Scaling Founders in partnership with the
for Creative Leadership
üîπ Scaling Companies in collaboration with


The programs concluded with an inspiring session attended by H.E. the Governor of Monsha‚Äôat, where participating companies shared their growth journeys, achievements, and discussed key challenges and opportunities for sustainable scaling. These initiatives reflect our belief in the power of direct enablement and in creating interactive platforms that connect entrepreneurs with ecosystem partners to accelerate growth and expansion.

Grateful for the inspiring companies that took part in this journey, and deeply appreciate all our partners who contributed to the success of these programs. A special thanks to everyone involved in the design and delivery of this impactful experience and heartfelt appreciation for the strategic guidance that helped shape the outcomes

It was a pleasure to oversee this effort as part of the Tomoh team, and we look forward to supporting more success stories in the future üöÄ

Special thanks tofor his invaluable strategic guidance.

Led the end-to-end delivery of the Saudi Unicorns Program (>>$1Mn partnership)‚Äîan initiative by the Saudi govt to enable 35 of their top startups toward achieving unicorn status
(More about the program - https://saudiunicorns.net/en)

- Orchestrated the delivery of 14+ founder masterclasses, 65+ 1:1 mentoring sessions with startup operators, and 33 operating engagements. The outcome was an NPS of 92

- Managed key relationships with Misk (non-profit government body) and Endeavor (Saudi partner); coordinated with cross-functional teams like OKRs, Customer Experience, Operations, Academy, and People Excellence to ensure seamless execution
Building Learning Products (Founder's Academy, Leadership Quotient, IIMB Partnership, B2C products)

Bangalore Urban, Karnataka, India
Bangalore Urban, Karnataka, India
Founder's Academy
- What: Founder-focused masterclasses on 10 scaling pillars (xto10x framework)
- Impact: 100+ founders graduated; 1 in 3 became unicorns, portfolio growth of ~10-12x. Notable alumni include Razorpay, Groww, Licious, Wakefit, Rapido and more
- My Role: Collaborated with startup operators (scaling 500+ startups) to develop playbooks and case studies

Leadership Quotient
- What: 360¬∞ feedback tool to improve leaders's effectiveness
- Impact: The tools has helped 700+ leaders in India, SEA and MENA get a comprehensive overview of their strengths and improvement areas
- My role: Coded the software that instantly generates personalized reports using survey data

IIMB Partnership
- Partnered with IIMB Bangalore to co-create a course for students. Featured speakers from Flipkart, Licious, PhonePe, and Curefoods
- Impact: 4.79/5 session rating. NPS of 60+
- My role: Program managed the initiative and later transformed it into a standalone learning product

B2C Products
-Designed a full-cycle process from planning to post-production (converting office space into studio, onboarded 3PL editors, etc). Produced videos at cost of ~20k per hour of video,industry benchmark is ~1L per hour
- Repurposed IIMB recordings into a B2C product. Achieved 500+ course signups and a 4.79/5 rating
- Launched "The Startup Insiders" brand, grew the followership to 1000+
- Produced marketing videos to drive enrollment in our products (Sample: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ppdSX5dkOho)
